title: Interpretation of seeing dead people in a dream

preview.html: It is a comfort for the dreamer's family, and if they enter the dreamer's house, this indicates the blessing and goodness that will come to that house, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the deceased in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the dead person is sitting in her house in a dream and eating. This is an indication that This single woman will bring a lot of goodness and food to her home without getting tired. And the unmarried woman who sees that her fiancé buried many of the dead near her in a dream in her house. This indicates that he will get married very soon, God willing, and will achieve good deeds. And the unmarried girl who saw The dead were sitting next to her and I felt very sorry for her. It indicates that she is doing some bad things in her life and she should stop doing that. For an unmarried girl to see in a dream that the dead are calling her in a dream and responding to her. The meaning indicates that she will face a lot of good things in her future life. See also: Ibn Sirin’s detailed interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees in a dream that the deceased, she will often sit in her house in the dream. This indicates that there are good things in her life that she will experience, God willing. Seeing a married woman In a dream, the dead are arguing in front of her house in a dream. This is a sign that her house will be very welcoming to new people in the coming period. A married woman asks her husband to determine where the dead are sitting in the dream. The meaning indicates that she will do good and charitable works in her life. And if the married woman In a dream, she looks at the dead in a dream and cries for them intensely. The meaning indicates the great satisfaction with which she will live her life, God willing, during this period. Interpretation of seeing a dead person in a dream for a divorced woman: When a divorced woman dreams that the dead are inside her house, she screams in fear. It indicates that she will live with great satisfaction. And abundant support in her life, God willing. The divorced woman who sees that the deceased was trying to reconcile her with a divorced woman indicates that she will actually return to her estranged wife in this coming period of her life, and God knows best. Either the divorced woman sees that there are many dead people in her house and she is very afraid of them. The meaning indicates the crises that she is going through in her life, which will end in the coming period, God willing. The divorced woman saw the dead eating and drinking in her house and was happy. It is interpreted as a health disease in which she lives and spends her life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. The interpretation of seeing the dead in a dream about the man and its meaning if he sees The dreamer in a dream that the deceased were sitting in his house and laughing in the dream. It is stated that he will face some major crises in his life during this time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If the dreamer sees that he is eating with the deceased in the dream and he is very happy. This indicates that the man will live in this The period is a major financial crisis, and God knows best. The dreamer who saw that the dead will appear in the dream and watch them. D- The meaning is that he deeply misses a person who has died, God knows, and he is close to him in life and wants to see him. And the dreamer saw

title: What if I dreamed that my hair was falling out because of Ibn Sirin?  I dreamed that my hair fell out in clumps, and I dreamed that my hair fell out in large clumps, and I dreamed that my hair fell into my hands.

preview.html: I dreamed that my hair was falling outA common vision that causes anxiety about some unwanted future events, because in reality hair may fall out as a result of a certain disease or due to age and infirmity, but hair may also fall out due to damage and damage. It is time to replace it with other, more vibrant hair, so dreaming of hair loss can have good connotations as well as frightening and disturbing meanings. There are many interpretations depending on the nature and details of the dream. I dreamed that my hair was falling out because of Ibn Sirin. I dreamed that my hair was falling out. According to the opinions of great commentators, hair loss can lead to good interpretations that herald praiseworthy events and happy news, but it may also indicate bad meanings, depending on the shape and color Hair loss, quantity and cause. they. From falling out. If the hair is long and abundant, it begins to fall out profusely until baldness is complete, then this is a sign of a significant deterioration in the current circumstances. Also, seeing gray or damaged hair falling out often represents recovery from incurable diseases and freedom from pain and suffering (God willing) And the beginning of a new, happy life full of events and adventures. As for someone who sees a lot of hair falling out of his head, this means that he will face a lot of trouble in the coming period in order to be able to pay off all his debts that he accumulated in the last crisis, but he is doing so successfully. While a person who sees that he is losing his newly dyed hair, this is an indication that he will get a good job that will generate a lot of income for him because he has been looking for a job that suits his abilities for a long time. I dreamed that my hair was falling out because of Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin believes that hair strands fall out on The fortuneteller's hands are a sign that he has good health and a strong body that will help him live and live for many years with happiness and peace of mind. It also says that the loss of damaged hair indicates the end of illness, pain and suffering, and that what is to come will be much better (God willing) as the fortuneteller will be rewarded with a reward. Good and abundant goodness for his patience and. Strength in the previous period. Likewise, if a person sees his long, dark hair falling out, this means that he will go through some crises in the coming days, and he may lose some valuable things that are dear to him, but he will go through them peacefully. A period of time. I dreamed that my hair was falling out. Many commentators agree that for an unmarried woman who sees her thick hair falling out until others are alive, this indicates that she will get married soon and enjoy a successful family life and give birth to good offspring. As for seeing her long, soft hair falling out With abundant hair falling from above her head, this means that she is a patient person who suffers from difficulties and problems to reach her goal and achieve her goals. Some also believe that the loss of hair strands is evidence that the Lord (Glory be to Him) will transform her sadness into inexhaustible joy and happiness and compensate her for what he saw in the previous period. Likewise, if an unmarried woman sees her dark black hair falling out, this is evidence that she is a good girl who loves her parents.

We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing a child reciting the Qur’an may indicate the good deeds that he performs, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees a child reciting the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate that she will be blessed with a good son, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees a child He reads the Qur’an, as this may lead to righteousness and piety, and God is All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream that I memorized the Qur’an in a dream. Interpretation of a dream that I memorized the Qur’an in a dream. Memorizing the Qur’an can indicate knowledge, and God knows the unseen. Seeing memorizing the Qur’an may also indicate attaining a high status, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When You see an unmarried girl memorizing the Qur’an in a dream, this may indicate the good deeds that she performs, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman is seen memorizing the Qur’an with justice, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about swearing by the Qur’an in a dream. The unseen, because seeing an oath in the Qur’an may indicate testimony about certain matters, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees in a dream that two oaths are in court, this may be evidence of testimony of faith, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees an oath in the Qur’an in front of someone he knows, he may resort to research About the truth, and God is Most High and Most Knowing.Interpretation of dreams I swear to God in a dreamInterpretation of a dream in which I swear to God in a dream can indicate deception and God knows the unseenBecause seeing an oath in a dream can be a sign of deception from both sides, and God knows the unseenWhen you see a vow in a dream, it can It could be a sign of humiliation, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a bus trip in a dream can represent goodness and getting rid of trouble, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a kiss on the head in a dream for different occasions

preview.html: Interpretation of a kiss on the head in a dream for different occasions. We all kiss the head of our loved ones, especially our parents, and with this act we give respect and gratitude to them or to any big or beloved person, but when someone sees that he kisses the head of others in a dream, especially when he is an important or tall person And tall, he begins to search for an explanation and meaning for this vision. For this reason, interpreters have provided some interpretations that talk about this act, so in this article today we will learn about the interpretation of a kiss on the head in a dream for different situations. Interpretation of a kiss on the head for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees that her mother kisses her on the head in a dream. This is a good omen that beautiful events are coming. Seeing a girl in a dream kissing her head indicates that this girl is pious and does not disobey her Lord or disobey her family. Seeing yourself kissing the head of a father, mother, or a family member indicates multiple relationships and kinship. Interpretation of dreams about a kiss on a woman’s head Single, and if a girl sees that someone is kissing her head, this symbolizes her short marriage. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the head in Ibn Sirin’s dream interpretation. Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin is considered the most important and important facilitator of dreams in the world, and he sees the interpretation of the kiss on the head as follows: Whoever sees the kiss in his sleep: Denoting the dreamer's need. Seeing yourself kissing the head in a dream means that you are taking advantage of someone. Kissing children in a dream obscures the relationship between family relationships. If a person dreams of kissing his mother in a dream. This symbolizes the mother’s satisfaction with the dreamer, and the fulfillment of all his dreams. Seeing a mother’s kiss in a dream generally symbolizes the approach of goodness, success, and success by the person who sees it. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the head Interpretation by Al-Nabulsi Al-Nabulsi is considered one of the most important dream interpreters and interprets kisses on the head in a dream on As follows: If a person dreams of kissing his head, this represents his imminent victory over his enemies. If a person sees in a dream that he is kissing a dead person, this symbolizes that the dreamer will benefit in some way from the goodness left by that dead person. If a person sees in a dream that he is kissing Beautiful woman in a dream. This indicates that this person is a reader of the Qur’an. Seeing someone kissing children, girls or boys, in a dream shows the strong relationship that brings the dreamer close to the children’s father. If a person dreams of kissing, this indicates the fulfillment of all his dreams. Interpretation of seeing a kiss on the head in a dream Interpretation of Ibn Shahin Ibn Shaheen is one of the greatest dream facilitators in the world, and regarding his vision of kissing the head, he said the following: If a person sees in a dream that he is kissing a beautiful woman. This means marrying a widow to benefit from her money. Seeing a man kissing a man in his sleep. It symbolizes the arrival of goodness to the Lord through this man. Seeing someone kissing any kind of animal indicates that he is measuring feelings of love for a cruel person and does not take into account humanity in dealing with people. If one sees in a dream that he is kissing a bird. This reflects the approach of travel and abundance of livelihood. Seeing someone kissing a dog is a sign of manna

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a mother committing adultery in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a mother committing adultery in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing adultery can lead to failure to maintain trust and that God has knowledge of the unseen. Seeing adultery can also represent betrayal, and God knows best. When you see prostitution in a dream it can be a sign of deception and betrayal, and God knows all that He does not see the interpretation of dreams when I see my fiancée committing adultery in a dream. The interpretation of dreams to see my fiancée committing adultery in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a woman committing adultery in a dream could be a sign of doubt, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees his wife cheating on him, this may lead them to being able to overcome problems and difficulties, and God knows best. When you see the wife cheating on a wealthy man, it may indicate... Experiencing financial losses, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing a person committing adultery in a dream may be a sign of problems with him, and God knows the unseen. An unmarried girl can express a person close to her prostitution. She can express her fear of his betrayal, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a woman committing adultery in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a woman committing adultery in a dream could be a sign that you are going through a difficult period, and God knows the unseen. When the dreamer sees a woman She commits adultery in a dream, this may be a sign of a financial crisis, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees a woman committing adultery, this may lead to the theft that she commits, and God knows best. When she sees a woman practicing prostitution in a dream, this may represent the problems she faces, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream

title: Read what Ibn Sirin said in interpreting a dream about a dog falling without pain

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dog falling without the falling fang in a dream is one of the matters that raises various questions for its owner, and he feels a strong desire to know the meaning of this strange vision that is not limited to a certain age like any other person. He can see it in his dream because it indicates many beautiful and happy meanings, apart from the bad and unpopular meanings, and that depends on the vision and its owner. You can read more explanations by going to the section Interpretation of Dreams. Interpretation of a dream about a dog falling without pain. A person is not devoid of adversity, sadness, and worry. When he sees this dream, it is evidence of the end of that period with all its problems and disturbances, and the beginning of a new period of hope, comfort, psychological and social. More. If the fall is from the lower side, this indicates that the person is suffering from faltering in his economic and financial circumstances in which he loses many of his possessions. Perhaps it expresses the loss of one of his children to a man, so he is patient and asks for his reward from God and does not worry. All of God’s experiences for man are good and a blessing from God. The tusk falling with all its teeth into the dreamer’s hands is a sign of longevity, but his life will not be without a feeling of sadness and pain, because his long life makes him suffer from the loss of many people close to him. for him. Whether by his children, family members, or close friends. A dream in which a fang or a tooth falls out is unhealthy and eroded by decay indicates that its owner will earn a lot of money, but he will earn it by doing many actions that are not approved by Sharia or the law. By order of the owner. It is also evidence of a person’s success in worldly matters. If a person is a merchant and has carried out many important transactions, this means that his business affairs will improve significantly in the coming period, which will change the course of his life for the better. The presence of any problem with the dog, such as lack of hygiene or weak structure and structure, is evidence that this person’s family is suffering from psychological and physical pain and suffering and their inability to withstand pressure. Possible. Its fall due to the movement of a person’s tongue is evidence that this person caused a lot of trouble to his family as a result of vomiting his tongue without any prohibitions or restrictions, and he may have talked about matters that it would have been better for him to keep to himself. Tongue. About.Interpretation of a dream about a dog falling without pain, according to Ibn Sirin. Our scholar mentioned that this dream is evidence of the dreamer’s success in giving birth to a new child. He also mentioned the type of this baby, which depends on where the tusk falls. If it falls from above, this is good news for the male child. The evidence is that the person will be affected by overwhelming joy that will make him feel a mixture of contentment and optimism, and the reason for happiness may be the improvement of his financial conditions, the ease of his affairs, and the disappearance of what he suffers from. Losses and distress. Sustenance. Dreaming about a divorced woman has many meanings. If this woman has a debt that she cannot repay, this is evidence that the debt will expire from this following period. It expresses the mood of the divorced woman in a group of problems that surround her and prevent her from enjoying her life like the rest of her family members. The presence of the fang in the vision is as if it is made of silver

title: Interpretation of a dream about snow according to Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing snow in a dream for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, and a man if it snows, eating snow, and walking in the snow, according to Ibn Sirin, Imam al-Sadiq, and... More snowInterpretation of snow in a dreamJaafar al-Sadiq said: Dreaming of snow indicates six broad aspects of livelihood, life, a lot of money, cheap prices, the army, and illness if you collect it in the summer. Seeing snow in a dream generally indicates the problems, misfortunes, and difficulties that will befall the dreamer, according to his vision of the location of the snow in the dream. And whoever dreams that he is in the middle of a freezing storm, this indicates his failure to achieve something in the future and the dreamer was a successful student of the eclipse. Whoever sees snow will be afflicted with sadness, illness, and pain, unless he sees it for a period. And whoever sees: snow in the winter or in a country where snow falls constantly, this indicates blessing and prosperity. And whoever sees: snow in the cold is good, and if he sees it in a warm place, it shows drought and distress, and if he eats snow if it is winter, it is better in the summer. Al-Karmani said: If he sees snow in a cold place, it is better, and if he sees it in a hot place, it indicates drought and distress. In short, seeing snow is interpreted in six ways: abundance of food, life, a lot of money, cheap price, the army, and illness if you collect it in the summer. Interpretation of snow in a dream Ibn Sirin If a snowman is seen in a dream, this means food and a lot of money on its way to the future. Interpretation of snow in a single dream When a single woman dreams that she is walking on snow in a dream, this indicates that she feels safe and calm in the place where she lives. She does not feel safe and stable with her partner, whether engaged or married. Interpretation of snow in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees that she was playing with snow in a dream, this is evidence of many marital disputes and arguments and her instability with her life partner, and if she dreams that she is eating snow, this indicates that she has spent a lot of time. Money. Interpretation of snow in a pregnant woman's dream Seeing snow on a pregnant woman in a dream indicates kindness and nourishment, provided that she does not play or mind. Interpretation of a dream about snow in a dream YouTube

title: Interpretation of a dream about giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl

preview.html: Interpretation of the appearance of the birth of twins, a boy and a girl, in a dream for an unmarried girl When an unmarried girl sees herself giving birth in a dream to a twin boy and a girl. This dream indicates that she will fall into something unpleasant that will bring her distress. But you will overcome this experience, God willing. Also, the birth of twins, a boy and a girl, for an unmarried woman is an unfavorable sign. It is mentioned that she is upset about the financial situation and that it will improve soon. The birth of twins, a boy and a girl, in a dream is considered for an unmarried woman according to the interpretation of Nabulsi. It symbolizes an incomplete connection with an inappropriate person, God is higher and more knowledgeable. In the case where an unmarried woman saw herself giving birth to twins. A sign that the coming period for her will hear what pleases her heart, God willing. The dream indicates that an unmarried woman gives birth to twins. That her husband will have a lot of money, God willing. The birth of twins in a dream for a single woman can be a sign that a job or job will come to her if she is really looking for and wants it. The birth of twin girls in a dream is a good and commendable vision. Indicates honest presence For their unusual pathological qualities. As for the birth of two crosses, it symbolizes the difficulty of achieving what she wants and desires. Because of the consequences that appear to her, she must pray a lot to God to remove all evil from her path. When a single girl gives birth to two boys, this symbolizes the warning she needs in her life. They may also do things that do not please God Almighty and need to stop and repent. He may see that an unmarried girl gives birth to twin daughters in her dream. It indicates his closeness to God and doing righteous obedience to Him, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Seeing a girl giving birth to female twins can be a sign of great wealth that can be obtained in a period that is not very long. Or it may be good news that the things you want and want to get will happen. Giving birth to two boys in a dream is not praiseworthy for the unmarried, because it symbolizes the emergence of negative things, and God knows best. The previous dream may be an indication of the high grades that she will get in her studies, if she is still a real student. The birth of two male children shows the qualities of the future husband for the bachelor. She has a difficult, unkind nature and tendencies may arise between them during the engagement period, and God is Most High And I know. See also: Interpretation of dreams about the birth of a boy for my friend Interpretation of seeing the birth of twins, a boy and a girl, in a dream for a married woman When a married woman dreams that she is giving birth to twins, a boy and a girl. It indicates the marital bliss in which she lives. But she must be careful because there are people who want to destroy her home and hate her, and God is greater and more knowledgeable. Seeing the birth of twins, a boy and a girl, in a dream. A sign of the changes that will happen to this woman and will bring about changes for the better. Likewise, pregnancy with twins is considered good news for her husband’s livelihood. Which will open up for him and will bring about a great change in the financial situation for the better. Also, her husband’s social status is higher, and God knows best. Seeing the birth of twins in a dream for a married woman is not praiseworthy for her, indicating that

title: Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife in my family’s home and its repercussions

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife in my family’s home. A person may spend moments remembering his past life, especially if he has lived for a period of time with a certain person or people. If the woman is divorced, he remembers her life with her ex-husband, and she remembers her days with him with bitterness and kindness. She can To see him in her dream as if he were in her home or her family’s home, depending on the circumstances. I put the person who fits the interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife in my family’s home.Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife in my family’s homeIf a divorced woman sees in her dream that her ex-husband has come to her family’s home, this indicates many clues, including: If she sees him in her family’s home, At that time she felt very sad, so this is evidence of the distress that brought her to her. But if she saw her ex-husband talking to her father, this dream means that he is thinking about returning to her. And if she sees herself wanting her ex-husband to return to her family home, this is a sign that she is thinking Seeing him in her family home may indicate that it may indicate developments in the lives of the two people. This dream may also be a sign that he will return to her soon. Seeing strife between a divorced woman and her family indicates the end of the dispute between them. See also: Interpretation Dreaming about intercourse with my ex-husband in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about my ex-wife. Hello to my mother. There are many dreams that a divorced woman can see in a dream, including her seeing her ex-husband, which has many evidence, depending on the details related to this dream, and the divorced woman seeing her ex-husband greeting her. Her mother expresses different meanings, such as: A divorced woman sees her ex-husband greeting her father, and he expresses his preoccupation with her thought, as well as his desire to return her to him. Likewise, when she sees her ex-husband kissing her, this is a sign of happy news that she will hear soon. This dream may also indicate That she will get rid of her problems in life. In addition, it indicates the beginning of a new life. The kiss may indicate that the woman will return to her ex-husband. Also, this dream indicates that her differences with her husband will end and all her problems will be solved. And if her ex-husband comes to her crying in In a dream, this means that he has overcome problems. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing divorce in a dream for a married and single woman. My ex-boyfriend is sitting next to me in a dream. A divorced woman may dream of her ex-husband sitting with her, and she may be busy thinking about him all the time. So we say: If she is sitting with him somewhere outside the house, this is a sign that she wants to talk to him, as well as that she is busy thinking about him. Also, seeing her with him could indicate that she has taken some things into her life. Or it could mean creating new relationships. Depending on the psychological state that accompanied the dream, we determine whether these relationships are good or bad. If her psychological state is bad when she sees her ex-husband in a dream, this means that there are problems in her life that she is suffering from. But if she is happy and happy in the dream, then this

title: Interpretation of seeing earth in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi and its repercussions

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the earth in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, the earth is the vision that we have always seen in a dream, it carries many of these positive and good connotations, as in a man’s dream it is evidence of a wife and it signifies power, money and prestige while cultivating the land, and it is evidence of the abundance of sustenance and many Among other interpretations, and in this context, we look at the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi’s vision of the earth in a dream and its consequences. Interpretation of seeing the earth in a dream by Ibn Sirin, especially since the scholar Ibn Sirin explained many of the connotations of this dream, as it indicates the abundance of food and wealth. Of poverty and other positive and good interpretations, and in this context we learn about the interpretation of seeing land in a dream by Ibn Sirinho also: Seeing agricultural land in a dream is a sign of agriculture and cultivation. Likewise, it is evidence of the vegetation of plants, and what comes after that of goodness and livelihood. Also If the land is known to the dreamer. This becomes clear to the owner of the land or to anyone who offers or rents it. While seeing the unknown land, this dream is considered a sign of a father, father, husband, husband, partner, or responsible person. See also: A detailed explanation of my deceased brother in a dream to a son Sirin: Interpretation of the dream of cultivating the land by Ibn Sirin, especially since cultivating the land in a dream is one of the dreams that gives hope, happiness, and optimism to those who see it, and it fulfills many dreams, aspirations, and livelihood as well. Interpretation of the dream of cultivating the land by Ibn Sirin also: And if this vision is in the woman’s dream, then this dream is evidence that she A fair and kind woman. But if one sees a man getting up in a dream, picking the fruits of the cultivated land. This dream is evidence of earning money or getting married soon, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Whereas if one sees in his dream that he is walking in the middle of a very green space, this means food for the fortuneteller. While if one sees dry agricultural land in his dream, this means that he will face many difficulties. See also: Interpretation of the dream of seeing milk or milk in a dream in detail according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of scorched earth for a single woman. Many visions are related to the land in the dream, and these visions often carry It connotes goodness, livelihood, and money for the dreamer, and it also carries various other meanings based on the details we see in the dream. In this context, we inform you of the interpretation of the dream of scorched earth is also: If a married man sees land plowed in a good way in a dream. Perhaps this vision is evidence of acquiring abundant money. If a married woman sees this dream, then this dream is a sign of the goodness that she will receive in the coming period. But this vision in a pregnant woman’s dream may be evidence of the ease of childbirth, and it will be easy for him to see it. And also if an unmarried girl sees plowed land in a dream. And God knows that this vision is a sign of goodness and the fulfillment of desires. See also: Interpretation of a dream about jinn and devils in a dream by Ibn Sirin and its meaning in detail. Interpretation of a dream about a farm for a married woman. Some...
